SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS DB_OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM AS DB_OBJ_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS OBJ_CLS, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T103.CD_NM END) AS TYPE_CLS, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS MNGR, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 191 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DB_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 192 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SCHEMA_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 121 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DID_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 125 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DB_TYPE FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_INFOTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) OR ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_CLSTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId}
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT T101.ADM_OBJ_ID AS COL_NM , T101.OBJ_NM AS COL_ATR_NM , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS ORACLE_DATA_TYPE , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS PDA_DATA_TYPE , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 113 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS TIBERO_DATA_TYPE , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 114 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS SYBASE_DATA_TYPE , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_LEN , MAX(CASE WHEN T104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T104.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_SCALE FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 ) INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010303L' AND T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL = T103.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T104 ON ( T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010302L' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS TAB_OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID AS TAB_OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM AS TAB_OBJ_NM, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS COL_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_TYPE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_LEN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DATA_SCALE, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS NOT_NULL_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS PK_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS FK_YN, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 111 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DISTRIB_KEY_ORD, MAX(CASE WHEN T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 112 THEN T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL END) AS DID_YN FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T101.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M T103 ON ( ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_INFOTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) OR ( T103.CD_GRP_ID = 'DSGN_COMM_CLSTYP' AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND T103.CD_ID = T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{pathObjTypeId} AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = #{pathObjId} GROUP BY T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM, T101.OBJ_DESC, T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T104.OBJ_ID, T104.OBJ_NM ) T101 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(COL_ORD, '0009')
SELECT T101.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS SCHEMA_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_ID = #{databaseId} AND T101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102

SELECT T102.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS DB_TYPE FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D T102 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID AND T102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE T101.OBJ_ID = #{databaseId}
